meanings.sent1: The spy used an alias to hide his real name.
meanings.sent2: The criminal operated under an alias to avoid being caught.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretended to be a dog, an alias that fooled everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an alias for the sadness she felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's alias was known to all as a symbol of justice.

meanings.sent1: She is alias Mary, but her friends call her Molly.
meanings.sent2: The famous singer, alias the Queen of Pop, will perform tonight.
meanings.sent3: The magician, alias the Great Houdini, amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The storm, alias the Beast from the East, brought heavy snowfall.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure, alias the Phantom, haunted the old theater.
